## Related Documentation

## Description
- Create the research plan, utilizing what research methodology, and what questions we plan to ask/get answers for during the study.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create new folder for this specific test in this [overall research folder]().
- [ ] Create research plan (template in research checklist above)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Review research plan and conversation guide with team
- [ ] Post finalize research plan to GitHub folder
